name: V-005: Boxed Recycling Waste Collection Operations

competencies.name: Operative checks that there is sufficient space both vertically and horizontally to allow the safe operation of the hydraulically operated lifting equipment
Operative does not stand directly beneath the lift whilst it is being operated
Operative uses side openings to load stillages where these are available
Operative takes care when loading into openings above head height to avoid falling objects causing injury
Operative loads from ground level and avoids loading from the rear wherever possible
Operative loads vehicle from the nearside (kerbside) unless specifically directed otherwise
Operative does not attempt to get in or out of the vehicle from the offside
Operative does not ride in the back of stillage vehicle whilst it is in motion, even for very short distances
Operative does not attempt to get in and out of the vehicle unless it is completely stationary
Operative takes care when climbing up or down steps, particularly in wet or icy conditions
competencies.supportingText: Operative takes care when climbing up or down steps, particularly in wet or icy conditionsQ. What action should be taken to avoid or control adverse effects of wet or icy ground /floor conditions underfoot?

competencies.name: Operative does not place materials in stillage while the vehicle is in motion
Operative only rides in the cab using the seats provided with seat belts on
Operative wears ear defenders and eye protection whilst collecting tipping or sorting glass materials
Operative returns recycling containers to a safe position in order to avoid causing a trip hazard or obstruction
Operative follows instructions given by recycling facility operator
competencies.supportingText:
Operative follows instructions given by recycling facility operator

competencies.name: Operative stands on the ground during removal and replacement of the stillages and never stands on bed of the vehicle
Operative sweeps the vehicle bed only when instructed and with the permission of the plant operative and when all unloading and loading of the vehicle has ceased

competencies.name: Operative removes and replace stillages covers when tipping and at ground level
Operative cleans and dries food waste stillages at the end of the shift/ working day
